title: "Velodyne Lidar blames pandemic for sudden job cut it's being sued over"
excerpt: "Velodyne Lidar, the San Jose autonomous driving sensor pioneer, says it cut jobs last week because of \"sudden and unexpected\" changes caused by the coronavirus pandemic. A worker lawsuit accuses it of using the crisis as cover for moving jobs overseas."
